doc:
Sherri Shepherd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sherri_Shepherd 0 Sherri Evonne Shepherd (born April 22, 1967) is an American actress, comedian, author and television personality. She has appeared in several TV shows in recurring roles, and starred as Ramona Platt on the ABC sitcom Less than Perfect from 2002 to 2006, for which she was well received and was nominated for the BET Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series in 2005. From 2007 to 2014, Shepherd was a co-host on The View, for which she received multiple Daytime Emmy Award nominations, winning one in 2009. In 2009, she starred in a sitcom of her own on Lifetime, Sherri, which was cancelled after one season, and also published the novel Permission Slips: Every Woman's Guide to Giving Herself a Break. In 2012, she appeared as a celebrity contestant on the fourteenth season of Dancing with the Stars. Sherri_Evonne_Shepherd ( born April_22_,_1967 ) is an_American_actress , comedian , author_and_television_personality . She has_appeared in several_TV_shows in recurring_roles , and starred as Ramona_Platt on the_ABC_sitcom Less than Perfect from 2002 to 2006 , for which she was_well_received and was_nominated for the_BET_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actress in a_Comedy_Series in 2005 . From 2007 to 2014 , Shepherd was a co-host on The_View , for which she received multiple_Daytime_Emmy_Award_nominations , winning one in 2009 . In 2009 , she starred in a_sitcom of her_own on Lifetime , Sherri , which was_cancelled after one_season , and also published the_novel_Permission Slips : Every_Woman 's_Guide to Giving_Herself a_Break . In 2012 , she appeared as a_celebrity_contestant on the_fourteenth_season of Dancing with the_Stars .
